name: Astronauts V.S. Aliens
description:
Astronauts vs Aliens is an asymmetric fighting game that utilizes bombs  to clear a path to eachother to be able to fight. The astronauts are a team of two players that have to work together to fight the alien, Player Three. 

Player One drops the bombs strategically, and Player Two sets off the bombs, but only in the order in which they were placed down. The alien must avoid these bombs and kill the astronauts in order to win.

Devlog

https://github.com/simmj054/Astrosyaliens
